examples.korean: Also, many people thought snowboarding was just a fad. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 또한 많은 사람들은 스노우보 드가 일시적인 유행일 뿐이라고 생각했습니다. Neungyule
examples.english: Also, many people thought snowboarding was just a fad. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Highlights of the show include 'Starry Night, Arles' (1888) by Vincent van Gogh, 'Dancers Climbing the Stairs' (1879) by Edgar Degas, 'Portrait de Madame Gaudibert' (1868) by Claude Monet, and 'Card Players' (1890-1895) by Paul Cezanne. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이번 미술관전의 하이라이트는 빈센트 반 고흐의 '별밤' (1888), 에드가 드가의 '계단을 오르는 발레리나들' (1879), 클로드 모네의 '고디베르 부인의 초상' (1868), 폴 세잔의 '카드놀이 하는 사람들' (1890-1895) 등이다. Neungyule
examples.english: Highlights of the show include 'Starry Night, Arles' (1888) by Vincent van Gogh, 'Dancers Climbing the Stairs' (1879) by Edgar Degas, 'Portrait de Madame Gaudibert' (1868) by Claude Monet, and 'Card Players' (1890-1895) by Paul Cezanne. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: However, the Dagara tribe in West Africa thinks differently. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하지만 서아프리카의 드가라 부족은 다르게 생각합니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: However, the Dagara tribe in West Africa thinks differently. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: For the Dagara people, a person’s birthday falls on the day when his or her mother first thinks of him or her, long before the child is born. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 드가라 사람들에게 생일은 아이들이 태어나기 전에 엄마가 그들을 처음 생각한 날에 해당합니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: For the Dagara people, a person’s birthday falls on the day when his or her mother first thinks of him or her, long before the child is born. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Here, you can spend hours ice skating and then stroll into Courtauld gallery to view famous artworks of Monet and Degas. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이곳에서, 몇 시간동안 스케이트를 탈 수 있고, 그 이후에 모네와 드가의 유명한 작품을 보기 위해 Courtauld 미술전을 한가로이 거닐 수 있다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Here, you can spend hours ice skating and then stroll into Courtauld gallery to view famous artworks of Monet and Degas. Add to Wordbook
